metadata.description: Spells that create fire, heat, and light

spells.name: Palm of Flame
spells.description: Creates a small flame in the palm of your hand. The flame provides light equivalent to a candle and can be used to light combustible materials. The flame does not burn the caster.
spells.guidelines: Base 2 (create flame), +1 Touch becomes Personal, +1 Concentration

spells.name: Lamp Without Flame
spells.description: Creates a steady magical light equivalent to a bright torch. The light emanates from an object you touch and lasts until the next sunrise or sunset. No heat is produced.

spells.name: Pilum of Fire
spells.description: Creates a spear of fire that shoots from your hand toward a target. The flame does +15 damage and may set combustible materials ablaze.

spells.name: Flash of the Scarlet Flames
spells.description: Creates a burst of flame that does +10 damage to a single target. The flames are bright scarlet and may ignite combustible materials.

spells.name: Ball of Abysmal Flame
spells.description: Creates a massive ball of intense black flame that does +25 damage. The supernatural fire can melt metal and stone.

spells.name: Heat of the Searing Forge
spells.description: Heats a metal object to forge temperature, making it malleable for smithing. The object glows red-hot but does not damage the caster's hands.

spells.name: Circle of Encompassing Flame
spells.description: Creates a circle of flames around the caster. Anyone crossing the circle takes +10 damage from the flames.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (create damaging fire), +1 Touch, +1 Concentration, +2 Circle

spells.name: Blade of the Virulent Flame
spells.description: A weapon becomes wreathed in flames, adding +5 to its damage. The flames do not harm the wielder but will ignite combustible materials.

spells.name: Arc of Fiery Ribbons
spells.description: Creates multiple ribbons of flame that strike several targets. Each target in a group takes +10 damage from the flames.

spells.name: Conjure the Mystic Bonfire
spells.description: Creates a large bonfire that burns without fuel until sunrise or sunset. The fire provides warmth and light for a large area.

spells.name: The Incandescent Orb
spells.description: Creates a brilliant orb of light that floats near the caster. The light is as bright as daylight in a large area and can be moved by concentration.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (create bright light), +2 Voice, +1 Concentration, +1 for movement

spells.name: Infernal Combustion of the Soul
spells.description: Creates supernatural fire that burns from within the target's soul, bypassing physical armor. Does +30 damage and causes immense psychological trauma.
spells.guidelines: Base 20 (create soul-burning fire), +2 Voice, +1 Mentem requisite
